title: Super Utilizer
description: Super Utilizer is a thrilling arcade space shooter blending fast-paced action with match-3 strategy. Embark on a daring mission to clean up space by battling bizarre monsters, sorting interstellar trash, and upgrading your spaceship. Protect trade routes, conquer challenging bosses, and dive into modes like "Survival" and "Invasion." Adventure awaits beyond the starsâ€”gear up and make your mark!
